function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Traveling and non-necessary social contacts advised against by health directive.","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through social contact and travel.","Mitigation":"Canceling non-essential travel and encouraging remote communication to reduce the risk.","Technologies":"Remote communication technologies, such as video conferencing and telecommuting tools.","People":"General population, travelers, and individuals with symptoms of contagious diseases.","Owner":"Health organizations, government, and employers."},{"Description":"Nationwide school closures ordered in various countries.","Impact":"Reduction of social contact and spread of contagious diseases among students, teachers, and school staff.","Mitigation":"Implementing online learning and education methods to continue schooling while minimizing physical contact.","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, virtual classrooms, and digital education tools.","People":"Students, teachers, school staff, and parents.","Owner":"Education authorities, schools, and government."},{"Description":"Public events banned and lockdowns ordered in multiple countries.","Impact":"Limiting large gatherings and community interactions to reduce the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict lockdown measures and social distancing protocols, along with the utilization of advanced monitoring and enforcement technologies.","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, contact tracing apps, and public health monitoring tools.","People":"Event attendees, community members, and individuals in lockdown areas.","Owner":"Government, law enforcement, and public health agencies."}]}
